Journal.Title: Annals of the Royal College of Surgeons of England

Article.ArticleTitle: The history and development of breast implants.

Abstract.AbstractText: This review discusses the historical development of smooth and textured silicone gel filled implants, and examines the reasoning behind product development and aspects of surgical technique from a surgeon's perspective.
